column4: I'm having an odd problem with my mom's Eee PC (900): The webcam won't work o_O I thought this was supported out-of-the-box? It did work with the default Asus/Xandros OS..

web cams are not genurally suported very well by linux. although there is a library and program called gphoto2 that will support cams that store photos taken when the camera is not attached to the computer.

I know the story about webcams, but the driver does exist since the webcam actually did work with xandros, so I find it odd that it's not included in ubuntu (well I'm actually using the ubuntu eee-edition)
try looking threw the package system for the modules package needed for your webcam.
